data.title: John MARVIN
data.meta_description: Visit John MARVIN profile and read the full biography, watch videos and read all the latest news. Click here for more.
data.text: While attending MIT John Marvin was the national intercollegiate champion in 1946. At the U.S. Olympic Trials 10 years later, he tied with George Oâ€™Day in the Finn class, but under a tie-breaking rule involving superior secondary placings, Marvin was declared the winner and gained the place on the Olympic team.
